name: Application Proposals
description: Prescriptive chemical and fertilizer application plans generated from weather and agronomic triggers.

prd.problemStatement: Timing chemical and fertilizer applications correctly requires monitoring weather, GDD, disease windows, and agronomic conditions. Superintendents need proactive recommendations based on these triggers.
goals: Automatically propose applications when triggers are met
Generate prescriptive plans with product, rate, and timing details
Enable easy approval or modification of proposals
userStories: As a superintendent, I want application proposals based on triggers so that I don't miss optimal windows
As a superintendent, I want to see the rationale for each proposal so that I understand why it's recommended
As a superintendent, I want prescriptive product and rate details so that I don't have to look them up
As a superintendent, I want to approve or modify proposals easily so that I maintain control over applications
